name: Control (itch) (NDcisive Games)
description:
Games Members Control **Best Overall Game**
49-hour Game Jam, Spring 2017
University of North Carolina at Charlotte - This game is an exploration of negative space. I can't tell you anything about it, you must just try.
- We love hearing feedback! Contact us at https://www.facebook.com/NDcisiveGames/
Designed and created by: Ahmet Gencoglu & Zach Smith
